channel.title: Setting prices in Pest Control shop. [PI]
channel.description: Okay so I added some items in my pest control shop but currently they are 0 pc points. I mean I can add to a regular shop and change to desired price but it would be better if I couold use pest control or even my pkp shop.

Okay so I added some items in my pest control shop but currently they are 0 pc points. I mean I can add to a regular shop and change to desired price but it would be better if I couold use pest control or even my pkp shop.
